name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge
lore: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take it—and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.
blurb: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see...
allytips: Parrrley applies On Hit effects like Frozen Mallet or Black Cleaver.
Paying attention to low-health enemies on the map can land you a surprise kill with Cannon Barrage.
Try placing Cannon Barrage on the path of escape to cut off fleeing enemies.
enemytips: Parrrley deals a high amount of physical damage. Items that grant Armor can help if an enemy Gangplank is doing well.
Once Gangplank reaches level 6, watch out for his global-range ultimate, Cannon Barrage!

riot_spell_q.name: Parrrley
riot_spell_q.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold and {{ e5 }} Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

riot_spell_w.name: Remove Scurvy
riot_spell_w.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of his missing Health.

riot_spell_e.name: Powder Keg
riot_spell_e.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at a location for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores {{ e0 }}% Armor) to enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Champions take {{ e3 }} bonus physical damage from the explosion.

When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack).

Kegs health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13)

Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

riot_spell_r.name: Cannon Barrage
riot_spell_r.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Signals Gangplank's ship to fire {{ f3 }} waves of cannonballs at an area over {{ e3 }} seconds. Each wave deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

riot_spell_i.name: Trial by Fire
riot_spell_i.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Trial by Fire
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gangplank''' periodically empowers his next [[basic attack]] to burn the target, dealing {{pp|55 to 225|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds, with each tick occurring every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: If '''Gangplank''' successfully hits a target with ''Trial by Fire'', he {{ai|Trial by Fire 2|Gangplank|gains}} {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. Destroying a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} instantly readies ''Trial by Fire'' and grants its {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: ''Trial by Fire'' cannot be applied with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} or {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Parrrley
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and applying [[on-hit effects]].
wikia_skill_q1.description2: ''Parrrley'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: If ''Parrrley'' kills its target, '''Gangplank''' plunders {{gold|gold}} and {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling3: {{st|Gold Plunder|{{g|{{ap|3 to 7}}}}|Silver Serpent Plunder|{{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank|icononly=yes}} {{ap|4 to 8}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* {{tip|On-hit}} effects that deal area of effect damage will allow ''Parrrley'' to plunder from every enemy killed. This includes enemies killed by '''Gangplank's''' {{ais|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} when activated by ''Parrrley''.
* ''Parrrley'' doesn't count as a basic attack for {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Remove Scurvy
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, removing all [[crowd control]] affecting him and {{tip|heal|healing}} himself.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Remove Scurvy'' only removes crowd control debuffs, so it cannot remove:
** {{sis|Ignite}} damage over time
** {{sis|Exhaust}} damage reduction
** {{tip|Airborne}} crowd control effects (pull, knockback, knockup...)
** {{ai|Malefic Visions|Malzahar}}
*** Yet it is one of the few abilities that can remove {{tip|suppression}}.
**** {{ai|Nether Grasp|Malzahar}} and {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} will still damage '''Gangplank''' even if he moves away.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Powder Keg
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gangplank''' stores a charge of ''Powder Keg'' periodically, up to a maximum of 3 stored at once.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' places a ''Powder Keg'' at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby ''Powder Kegs''.
wikia_skill_e1.description3: '''Gangplank''' and his enemies can attack the ''Powder Keg'' with their basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. '''Gangplank''' may also shoot the barrel with ''Parrrley''. If '''Gangplank''' scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected ''kegs''. If killed by an enemy, the ''keg'' is safely dismantled.
wikia_skill_e1.description4: An exploding ''keg'' deals the {{as|attack's damage}} to all nearby enemies, plus {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against champions, ignoring {{as|40% of their armor}}, as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* Placed barrels do '''not''' grant {{tip|sight|vision}}.
* An exploding ''Powder Keg'' will splash {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} bonus damage, and will also be modified if the attack critically strikes.
* An exploding ''Powder Keg's'' damage is not increased by most [[attack effects]] from runes or items, such as {{ii|Blade of the Ruined King}} or {{ii|Wit's End}}. There is a notable exception, however: the bonus damage from {{ii|Sheen}} (and its upgrades) will be splashed to all targets.
* The ''Powder Keg'' is classified as being hit for the purposes of triggering effects such as {{ii|Tiamat}} with the effects centered on the keg.
* As of [[V7.22]], enemies hit by ''Powder Keg's'' damage will be subject to [[ability effects]].

wikia_skill_r1.name: Cannon Barrage
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' signals his ship off-shore to fire upon the target area for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} it for the duration. Each wave deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: '''Gangplank''' can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}} each, which improve ''Cannon Barrage'':
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Cluster|{{ap|40*3 to 100*3}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description3: {{sbc|{{ii|Death's Daughter}}:}} An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of {{as|true damage}} to all enemies it hits and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description4: {{sbc|{{ii|Raise Morale}}:}} The barrage grants allies {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
wikia_skill_r1.description5: {{sbc|{{ii|Fire at Will}}:}} ''Cannon Barrage'' fires{{ft|6 additional waves|2 additional clusters}} over its duration.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling3:
{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*12 to 100*12}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage with
''Fire at Will''|{{ap|40*18 to 100*18}} {{as|(+ 180% AP)}}|Maximum Mixed Total Damage with
''Fire at Will'' and ''Death's Daughter''|{{ap|40*21 to 100*21}} {{as|(+ 210% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * ''Cannon Barrage's'' slow lingers for 0.25 seconds after affected enemies leave the target area.
